name: 林群哲
objective:
本課程涵蓋兩部分：(1)介紹一階常微分方程式，二階與高階的線性微分方程式，包含物理問題或是其他問題導出微分方程式，以實際重要性的簡單方法求解答。(2)線性代數，矩陣、向量、行列式、線性方程式組，應用於電路與力學之最佳化計算過程。
This course includes two main parts: (1) Introduction of first-order ordinary differential equations, second-order and higher-order linear differential equations, including physics problems or other problems to derive differential equations, and solve them in a practical importance simple method. (2) Linear algebra, matrix, vector, determinant and linear equations can be applied in the optimized calculation process of circuits and mechanics.
